statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, rating, review FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, service_type, timestamp FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, service_type, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE service_type = 'Delivery' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, service_type, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY rating ASC
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, service_type, timestamp FROM customer_feedback WHERE service_type = 'Delivery' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY service_type
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE review IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, service_type FROM service_provider WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT provider_name, rating FROM service_provider ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT provider_name, service_type, location FROM service_provider ORDER BY provider_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT provider_name, location, rating FROM service_provider WHERE rating < 3.5 ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_rating > 20;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.feedback_text, s.provider_name FROM customer_feedback c JOIN service_provider s ON c.service_provider_id = s.provider_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE service_rating > 4;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, overall_satisfaction FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE loyalty_score < 3;
SELECT service_id, review_text FROM service_reviews ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT feedback_id, service_rating, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE service_rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, overall_satisfaction FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE overall_satisfaction < 3;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM service_reviews WHERE customer_id = 201 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM services ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT service_name, duration FROM services WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT customer_id, service_id, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT service_name, price, duration FROM services WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, service_id, rating, feedback FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY customer_id, service_id;
SELECT program_name, description, benefits FROM loyalty_program WHERE description LIKE '%discount%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, service_description, service_price FROM Services WHERE service_price < 100;
SELECT customer_name, review_rating, review_comment FROM Customers C JOIN Reviews R ON C.customer_id = R.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, loyalty_level FROM Customers C JOIN LoyaltyProgram L ON C.customer_id = L.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT service_name, service_price FROM Services ORDER BY service_price DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, s.service_name, r.review_rating FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Reviews r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id INNER JOIN Services s ON r.service_id = s.service_id WHERE r.review_rating > 3 ORDER BY c.customer_name, s.service_name;
SELECT r.review_id, r.review_comment, lp.loyalty_points FROM Reviews r LEFT JOIN LoyaltyProgram lp ON r.customer_id = lp.customer_id WHERE r.review_rating = 5;
SELECT s.service_name, AVG(rt.average_rating) AS avg_rating FROM Services s INNER JOIN Ratings rt ON s.service_id = rt.service_id GROUP BY s.service_name HAVING avg_rating > 4;
